0 = six-day baseline period before mindfulness therapy (therapy group only)
1 = six-day post-baseline period after mindfulness therapy (therapy group only)
features.labels:
0 = six-day baseline period before mindfulness therapy (therapy group only)

features.name: pleasantness
features.coding: Pleasantness of the most important event that happened between the current and the previous response (-4 - 3)
features.wording: Pleasantness of the most important event that happened between the current and the previous response
features.comments: Labels and wording not fully clear, but original article states that "High pleasantness thus reflected high skill, low effort, low preference for doing something else, and high enjoyment of the activity"
